name: Code Bots
description:
A simple programming platformer made for the 2021 #LOWREZJAM

Reach the teleport pad to complete the level. Avoid spikes and being squished by moving walls.

Edit your code, or start/stop the playback in the upper right corner. Click and drag to scroll the screen on larger levels.

Unlock more commands as you complete levels:

  • Left/Right
  • Jump & Jump Left/Right
  • Wait
  • Loop & Closing Bracket
  • Condition, Else,  & Closing Bracket
